The results of the Crypto Pulse survey, the world’s largest survey on trust and adoption of cryptocurrencies, are in and speak of determination among crypto users around the globe.
Bitstamp Launches Earn Product in the United States
Bitstamp now allows U.S. customers to participate in staking at up to 5% APY*, starting with ALGO and ETH ahead of The Merge
2022 Jabra Ladies Open presented by Bitstamp
The Jabra Ladies Open is held annually at the Evian-les-Bains Resort in France, which attracts some of the best female golfers from around the globe.
Bitstamp launches Bitstamp-as-a-service in the US
Bitstamp USA launches flexible, scalable institutional plug-and-play service as a result of growing demand for crypto adoption
Bitstamp leverages Notabene’s software to comply with Travel Rule in Singapore, the US and EU
Bitstamp has implemented Notabene’s end-to-end solution for crypto regulatory compliance to comply with global Travel Rule regulations across the US, EU and Singapore.
Leading digital asset firms launch Crypto Market Integrity Coalition, committing to a safe and sensibly-regulated crypto industry

The coalition, initiated by Solidus Labs and co-founded by 15 leading crypto exchanges, trading
firms and industry associations, introduces a pledge of commitment to safer markets and working
with regulators.
Bitstamp signed exclusive £4.5m sponsorship deal with Guild Esports
We’re excited to welcome Guild Esports, a global teams organisation and lifestyle brand, as our exclusive official partner with the signing of a three-year global sponsorship deal for £4.5 million.
We’re joining with TradingView to give you access to advanced crypto trading
We’re integrating with TradingView with the goal of providing you with a deeper insight into crypto markets and their vibrant community of more than 30 million traders and investors.
Bitstamp partners with cutting edge LHV Bank to offer crypto trading

Bitstamp will become the main liquidity provider for LHV Bank, which starts offering cryptocurrency trading to its customers in another sign that crypto is continuing to gain notable buy-in from traditional banking and financial services.
Bitstamp expands digital asset offering with Copper.co partnership

This partnership demonstrates Bitstamp’s commitment to global expansion and marks the continued growth of its customer-centric offerings. As demand increases, Bitstamp continues to provide its users access to the ever expanding market.
